Data Security in Tech Indurstry

Sunday, May 24 2015

With the growing information Technology world and everything technology driven these days, data is highly insecure. Here we are talking about users personal data , company data which is now treated as Information assets of any company. Hence this data must be adequately protected from the threats of being exposed. In a crisis and contingency environment such as the current one, companies tend to review their economic items in order to identify and eliminate superfluous costs.

With all kinds of threats like internal fraud, information leaks are getting more prevalent and introduction to cloud computing has increased the threat; data security has to be prioritized. Information being disclosed without consent is getting increased considerably. Hence Technology world Issues such, as Security of Data is a considerable issue in todayâ€™s technology world.

As per IBM With 2.5 quintillion bytes of data created every day, and with the average cost of security-related incidents in the era of big data estimated to be over USD40 million, now is the time to keep customer, business, personally identifiable information (PII) and other types of sensitive data safe against internal and external threats.

With so much data occurring each day, the questions rise as to how it is being safe and is it in the right hands and how to protect data from hackers, thieves and carelessness.

So we need to understand that is it right to be vulnerable with the data being on cloud for some third party service provider. So we need to make sure that the data, which is floating in cloud, has to be touched by the right people.
